messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Ah Joanne, you're truly poetic.:)
messages.msgSnippet: I think many would agree!  Thanks for permission! In Gratitude, Christy Putnam Unschooling Mom to Aden (1) and Seth (11) Loving wife of Chet (ann. 7/4/04)
messages.messageBody:
I think many would agree! Thanks for permission!

In Gratitude,

Christy Putnam
Unschooling Mom to Aden (1) and Seth (11)
Loving wife of Chet (ann. 7/4/04)

<http://blog.myspace.com/personal_balance>
http://blog.myspace.com/personal_balance

"Go confidently in the direction of your
dreams. Live the life you have always
imagined." - Henry David Thoreau




_____

From: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Joanne
Sent: Wednesday, May 17, 2006 12:17 PM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Ah Joanne, you're truly poetic.:)


Yes and thank you for thinking it's worthy of being posted
someplace. I appreciate it.

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (7), Shawna (10) & Cimion (13)
Adopted into our hearts October 30, 2003
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/
http://foreverparents.com

messages.subject: Ah Joanne, you're truly poetic.:)
messages.msgSnippet: This is amazing. Does anyone mind if I put this on my blog or myspace page? In Gratitude, Christy Putnam Unschooling Mom to Aden (1) and Seth (11) Loving wife
messages.messageBody:
This is amazing. Does anyone mind if I put this on my blog or myspace page?


In Gratitude,

Christy Putnam
Unschooling Mom to Aden (1) and Seth (11)
Loving wife of Chet (ann. 7/4/04)

<http://blog.myspace.com/personal_balance>
http://blog.myspace.com/personal_balance

"Go confidently in the direction of your
dreams. Live the life you have always
imagined." - Henry David Thoreau




_____

From: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Ren Allen
Sent: Sunday, May 14, 2006 8:42 PM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] A question for everybody.....


"Unschooling my children is enabling me to see them...for all they
are and all they can become.
Unschooling my children his enabling me to see that life really is
for living and exploring and singing and creating and discovering
and trying and doing and being."

Ah Joanne, you're truly poetic.:)
Beautiful...you made my heart sing.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: A question for everybody.....
messages.msgSnippet: Unschooling my children is enabling me to see them...for all they are and all they can become. Unschooling my children his enabling me to see that life really
messages.messageBody:
"Unschooling my children is enabling me to see them...for all they
are and all they can become.
Unschooling my children his enabling me to see that life really is
for living and exploring and singing and creating and discovering
and trying and doing and being."

Ah Joanne, you're truly poetic.:)
Beautiful...you made my heart sing.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
